item.title: Quick Tip: The local Windows 10 taskbar is in front during an RDP session
item.description: Sometimes it happens to me that the local taskbar of my Windows 10 laptop is in front and you donâ€™t have access to the remote toolbar during a full-screen RDP session. This is quite annoying. In the picture below you see the local toolbar of my Windows 10 laptop is in front during a full-screen RDP session.
